front.title: Packet Pseudowire Encapsulation over an MPLS PSN

abstract.t: This document describes a pseudowire mechanism that is used to transport a packet service over an MPLS PSN is the case where the client LSR and the server PE are co-resident in the same equipment. This pseudowire mechanism may be used to carry all of the required layer 2 and layer 3 protocols between the pair of client LSRs.
